etymology.description: 目(目) (mù, 'eye') + 爰(爰) (yuán, 'therefore; because') = sharp and discerning eyes -> bright
etymology.interpretation: The character 睿(叡) (ruì, 'bright') combines 目(目) (mù, 'eye') to represent vision, with 爰(爰) (yuán, 'therefore') serving as a phonetic indicator. This implies heightened perception or insight, thus denoting 'bright' in terms of intelligence or wisdom.
etymology.simplification: Simplified by removing 爰(爰) (yuán) and leaving a simplified form with just 目(目) (mù) + 一(一) (yī, 'one') as a representation of clarity or singular focus.

examples.chinese: 他有着睿的智慧(他有著睿的智慧)。
面对复杂问题(面對複雜問題)，他总能做出睿断的选择(他總能做出睿斷的選擇)。
examples.pinyin: Miànduì fùzá wèntí, tā zǒng néng zuòchū ruì duàn de xuǎnzé.
examples.english: In the face of complex issues, he always makes wise decisions.
